articles.title: Indian-Origin Man Drugged, Raped 5 Korean Women In Australia: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Balesh Dhankhar, a prominent member of the Indian community in Australia, was found guilty of raping five Korean women in Sydney after drugging them, a media report said on Monday.
articles.content:
In 2018, police found dozens of videos of Balesh Dhankhar with other women
